TR1.hpp File Reference

Includes all parts of C++03 (TR1) that are relevant for Gosu. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Includes all parts of C++03 (TR1) that are relevant for Gosu.

It makes available the following members of the std::tr1 namespace: array, bind, function, shared_ptr, uint*_t and int*_t.

Definition in file TR1.hpp.
